TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit SUDSGeneratorException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown if an error occurs during the generation of Web Services Description Language (WSDL).

remarks.format:
## Remarks The SUDSGeneratorException is generated by the remoting WSDL generator. The WSDL generator is used by the [Soapsuds Tool (Soapsuds.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/40f6f8c8-b80c-4e9f-a920-31bcd0cf45c5), and can also be invoked programmatically using the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.MetadataServices.MetaData> class.
SUDSGeneratorException uses the HRESULT COR_E_EXCEPTION, which has the value 0x80131500.
For a list of initial property values for an instance of SUDSGeneratorException, see the <xref:System.Exception> constructors.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: The that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains contextual information about the source or destination.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
